Loading airquality data for analysis
```{r}
library(datasets)
data("airquality")
summary(airquality)
```
plotting data
```{r}
pairs(airquality)
```
Regression model of ozone on some predictors
```{r}
fit <- lm(ozone ~ Solar.R + Wind + Temp, data = airquality)
summary(fit)
```
